text: Riverside Academy is a Pre K–12 private school in Reserve, Louisiana in St. John the Baptist Parish, Louisiana. The school opened in 1970. ==Athletics== Riverside Academy athletics competes in the LHSAA. State Championships Football Championships: 2016 ==Notable alumni== *Rico Gathers, NFL tight end and former college basketball player at Baylor University. ==References== ==External links== * Riverside Academy website Category:Schools in St. John the Baptist Parish, Louisiana Category:Private K-12 schools in Louisiana Category:Educational institutions established in 1970 Category:1970 establishments in Louisiana
title: Riverside Academy (Louisiana)
